sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtnadministrationword ( ADMINIST_WORD_ID /* */ , ADMINIST_WORD_NM /* */ , ADMINIST_WORD_ENG_NM /* */ , ADMINIST_WORD_ABRV_NM /* */ , THEMA_RELM /* */ , WORD_SE /* */ , RELATE_STD_WORD /* */ , ADMINIST_WORD_DFN /* */ , ADMINIST_WORD_DC /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ ) VALUES ( #administWordId# /* */ , #administWordNm# /* */ , #administWordEngNm# /* */ , #administWordAbrvNm# /* */ , #themaRelm# /* */ , #wordSe# /* */ , #relateStdWord# /* */ , #administWordDfn# /* */ , #administWordDc# /* */ , #frstRegisterId# /* */ , SYSDATE() /* */ , #lastUpdusrId# /* */ , #lastUpdtPnttm# /* */ )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtnadministrationword SET ADMINIST_WORD_ID=#administWordId# /* */ , ADMINIST_WORD_NM=#administWordNm# /* */ , ADMINIST_WORD_ENG_NM=#administWordEngNm# /* */ , ADMINIST_WORD_ABRV_NM=#administWordAbrvNm# /* */ , THEMA_RELM=#themaRelm# /* */ , WORD_SE=#wordSe# /* */ , RELATE_STD_WORD=#relateStdWord# /* */ , ADMINIST_WORD_DFN=#administWordDfn# /* */ , ADMINIST_WORD_DC=#administWordDc# /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID=#frstRegisterId# /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM=#frstRegistPnttm# /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID=#lastUpdusrId# /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM=#lastUpdtPnttm# /* */ WHERE ADMINIST_WORD_ID=#administWordId# /* */
sqlMap.select: SELECT ADMINIST_WORD_ID /* */ , ADMINIST_WORD_NM /* */ , ADMINIST_WORD_ENG_NM /* */ , ADMINIST_WORD_ABRV_NM /* */ , THEMA_RELM /* */ , WORD_SE /* */ , RELATE_STD_WORD /* */ , ADMINIST_WORD_DFN /* */ , ADMINIST_WORD_DC /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ FROM comtnadministrationword WHERE ADMINIST_WORD_ID=#administWordId# /* */

SELECT ADMINIST_WORD_ID /* */ , ADMINIST_WORD_NM /* */ , ADMINIST_WORD_ENG_NM /* */ , ADMINIST_WORD_ABRV_NM /* */ , THEMA_RELM /* */ , WORD_SE /* */ , RELATE_STD_WORD /* */ , ADMINIST_WORD_DFN /* */ , ADMINIST_WORD_DC /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ FROM comtnadministrationword WHERE 1=1
ADMINIST_WORD_ID = #searchKeyword# /* */
ADMINIST_WORD_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
ORDER BY ADMINIST_WORD_ID DESC /* */ limit #firstIndex#, #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM comtnadministrationword WHERE 1=1
ADMINIST_WORD_ID = #searchKeyword# /* */
ADMINIST_WORD_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
